animeDescription: A short anime directed by Yuasa Masaaki with Production IG, distributed on VHS as a bonus to a video game magazine subscription.  The main character is a Slime from the Dragon Quest video games.
animeStaff: [['Yuasa Masaaki', ['Director']], ['Ohira Shinya', ['Key Animation']], ['Yoshihara Masayuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Miyazawa Yasunori', ['Key Animation']]]
